parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping and jerking can cause loss of control, accidents, and injury to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The transmission jerks or slips when shifting gears
especially when accelerating or braking
causing the vehicle to hesitate or lurch forward. The vehicle may also stall or hesitate to engage into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission fails to engage into gear
causing the vehicle to stall or hesitate to move. The vehicle may also experience loud banging or clunking noises when shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission delayed response can cause loss of control, accidents, and injury to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The transmission exhibits a delayed response when shifting gears
causing the vehicle to hesitate or lurch forward. The vehicle may also stall or hesitate to engage into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the sidewall can lead to tire failure, which can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Cracks on the inner and outer sidewalls of the tires
tire vibration
and loss of air pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Tire blowouts
loss of control
and crashes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Response from Goodyear and Dealers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to address the issue can lead to continued use of defective tires, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Denial of reimbursement
lack of notification about recalls
and inadequate inspection of tires.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to jerk or hesitate when shifting gears, leading to loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Jerking or hesitation when shifting gears
slipping or hesitation when accelerating
loud banging or clunking noises when shifting gears
and difficulty shifting into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front struts can cause the vehicle to vibrate or shake excessively, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Vibrations or shaking when driving
especially over bumps or rough road surfaces
and loud clunking or knocking noises from the front of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor mounts can cause the engine to vibrate excessively, leading to premature wear on other engine components and potentially causing damage to the transmission and drivetrain.
symptoms: Excessive engine vibration
loud noises from the engine compartment
and difficulty shifting into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
and difficulty shifting into gear.
